pkgmetadata.longdescription: ================Python SnowFlake================A library that provides snowflake features to python, including Client and Server. You will not need toThis is extend of https://github.com/koblas/pysnowflake with Client adding.See `documentations <http://pysnowflake.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_----------Change log----------0.1.3****** Fix syntax errors with python 2.7
